page.title: 11HALLATON CHURCH AND CHAPEL
page.content: The Rector of Hallaton has five other parishes under his control: Allexton, Horninghold, East Norton, Tugby and Slawston. Regular Sunday services are still held at each church. In Hallaton there is a Communion service every Sunday, a midweek service and Evensong twice a month. The congregation varies between 10 and 40, more villagers attend at Christmas, Easter and Harvest Festival. On the evening following the Harvest Festival there is a Supper in the Stenning Hall. Events such as this continue to make the church an important focus for village life. Many people help with and attend the church Christmas Bazaar and Summer Fete. There is an active non-conformist Chapel with a service every Sunday. Lay preachers from the Leicester area take the service at which about 15 people are present.
